channel.title: Vps
channel.description: ok i bought a linux vps and i was wondering how id connect to it? i connected to it with putty or whatever but all i see is this cmd looking thing and i have no idea what to do with that lol. is there a way i could connect to it and it displaying a virtualbox? or something like windows?
